definition: to pick (flowers)/to pinch/to nip/to pinch off/to clutch/(slang) to fight
to break/to snap/to cut off/to give up or abstain from sth/to judge/(usu. used in the negative) absolutely/definitely/decidedly

sentences.english: As he crumples the flowering end of the weed in his hand, Nelson grimaces.
sentences.chinese: 尼爾森苦笑着掐斷手中雜草的花，把雜草弄死。

sentences.english: Cutting the fibre-optic cables that connect a country to the world, for example, might seem easy.
sentences.chinese: 例如，將連接到國外的光纖掐斷看起來很簡單。
